description: This file defines a SettingsApi object that provides functions to interact with settings-related API endpoints for retrieving, updating, toggling channels, and sending test reminders.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Fetches all settings including channels and preferences.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates settings with provided data, partial or full.

methods.name: toggleChannel
methods.description: Toggles a specific channel on or off based on parameters.

methods.name: testReminder
methods.description: Triggers a test reminder across selected channels.
